characters.name: Kaguya Shinomiya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 158 cm

The vice president of the student council of Shuchiin Academy, member of the wealthy Shinomiya family, she is a multi-talented genius who can do anything if she sets her mind to it. Due to the way she was raised, she instinctively looks down on others and thinks of ways to use them for her own benefit. Kaguya rarely interacted with other people before she joined the student council, but that has begun to change. She is an incredibly sheltered girl, resulting in her lacking in several pieces of what might be considered common sense. She still doesn’t understand love very well, and her main objective is to make [Miyuki Shirogane](https://anilist.co/character/121101) fall in love and confess to her.

Later in the series: ~!She confesses her love to Miyuki Shirogane and they start dating.!~

 ~!In a Oshi no Ko special chapter, it was revealed that she married Miyuki and changed her surname to Kaguya Shirogane!~

characters.name: Miyuki Shirogane
characters.description:
__Height:__ 175 cm

He is a second year student at Shuchi'in Academy and the president of the student council.

Miyuki is a handsome young man with blond hair and blue eyes. Due to his constant sleep deprivation and nearsightedness, his eyes appear to glare. He usually wears the regular Shuchi'in Academy black male uniform adorned with the Aiguilette, the golden chain-like accessory around his neck. The Aiguilette symbolizes his authority as student council president.

Shirogane is a diligent student who, despite his underprivileged background, climbed his way to the top of his class through hard work and determination. Shirogane holds himself in high regard, consistently working to maintain his perfect image. He is textbook workaholic, enjoying his part-time job and often putting his own health at risk for the sake of his work. Due to his poor background, Shirogane values money greatly and goes to great lengths to not be wasteful, and generally dislikes expensive gifts.

~!Miyuki's mother left his family when he was a child. Miyuki's father's factory was shut down and currently has no stable employment. They live in an apartment that costs ￥50,000 (Approx $450) a month. Due to this grisly past, he has been led to a lifestyle of part time jobs and hard work. He passed the Level 2 Kanji Kentei exam and has passed Grade Pre 1 on Eiken. He has also got second place on the National mock exam.!~

~!Miyuki transferred into Shuchi'in Academy during his first year of high school on a scholarship. His first week was a disappointment in that a great majority of his peers were condescending to him because of transferring in. Miyuki was being recruited to serve as the new student council general affairs officer by the Previous Student Council President and helped clean up a swamp. There, he saw Kaguya Shinomiya saving a girl from drowning. It was at that moment where he was truly charmed by Kaguya. At the advice of fellow student council member Momo Ryuju, he adopted the confident genius personality he is shown to have at the story's beginning in order to attract her.!~

Even though he is obviously in love with Kaguya Shinomiya, her wealth and talents greatly intimidates him, leaving him utterly terrified at the idea of confessing to her. He fears that all of his actions will lead Kaguya to look down him, causing him to overthink in many situations. Shirogane has never had a girlfriend and thus is actually quite clueless when it comes to romance, though his dignified demeanor leaves most of the students to think otherwise. Although he excels at studying, Shirogane has proven to be painfully talentless in a variety of other activities, such as sports, singing, dancing and more.

Despite this, Shirogane is unwaveringly kind and virtuous, never putting any of his goals above the well-being of others. He is extremely supportive and generous, willing to help any students with their problems, and will put aside his quest to get Kaguya to confess if it even has a chance of hurting someone else.

characters.name: Yuu Ishigami
characters.description:
The treasurer of the student council of the Shuchiin Academy. He's extremely valued by [Miyuki](https://anilist.co/character/121101), given that he single-handedly manages all the school's funds. He's also terrified of [Kaguya](https://anilist.co/character/120649), though no one else is sure why that is. Yuu keeps to himself and rarely speaks up, often getting into trouble when he does. He has a depressed outlook on life while having an inferiority complex. In contrast to his attitude, he is willing to help those in need and will sacrifice his pride if need be. Unlike his high school self, he had a much different outlook and demeanor during middle school.

Later in the series: 
~!Ishigami develops a crush on Tsubame that he inadvertently confesses his feelings for her at the school's cultural festival. Ishigami does not realize that his actions were perceived as a confession by the rest of the student body and is therefore oblivious to the implications of having given Tsubame a heart-shaped gift (considered akin to a confession in Shuchiin tradition). After some convincing by Kaguya, Tsubame decides to seriously consider Ishigami's confession, with her original intention being to let him down as gently as possible. It isn't until Ishigami watches Tsubame's performance of the traditional play that gave rise to the aforementioned tradition that he realizes his actions had unintended meaning. Even then, Ishigami's thickheaded nature prevented him from recognizing the full meaning of his actions: a straight confession!~

~!On the day of the third years' graduation ceremony, Tsubame finally has an answer for Ishigami's proposal. Despite Ishigami doing his best to convince Tsubame to accept him, Tsubame ultimately rejects Ishigami. Tsubame promises Ishigami that the two of them will remain friends and Ishigami sees her off with a smile and a gift of flowers. Afterwards, Ishigami breaks into tears, finally learning what heartbreak is like.!~

characters.name: Chika Fujiwara
characters.description:
The secretary of the Shuchiin Academy student council. She could not be predicted, her thoughts could not be read. A natural disaster who unconsciously threw everything into chaos simply by being present, also known as __Subject F__.

~!In chapter 222 of the manga, Chika reveals that she played piano because she wanted to be perfect, and she becomes a prodigy at the piano. The expectations of her family and her fans rose, forcing her to practice more. She quit piano after Kaguya told her to just quit if she didn't like the piano. Soon after Chika challenged Kaguya to a game battle and if she won, she would get to become Kaguya's friend. In the end, she becomes Kaguya's first friend.!~

characters.name: Miko Iino
characters.description:
__Height:__ 147 cm (4'7")

She is a freshman at Shuchiin Private Academy and the Auditor of the Student Council. Miko has a strong sense of justice and will correct others on what's right and wrong. Unfortunately, this led to her being bullied, though she still continues to uphold her idea of "right". She idolizes [Chika Fujiwara](https://anilist.co/character/121103), listening to anything she says, even if it's for Chika's enjoyment.

characters.name: Ai Hayasaka
characters.description:
Ai Hayasaka is a second-year student at Shuchiin Academy and a valet of the Shinomiya family. She is a member of the Hayasaka family, who have served the Shinomiya family for generations, gaining their trust.

Having been personally assigned to enter Shuchiin Academy with her, Ai supports [Kaguya Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/120649) in her high school life and has been a part of Kaguya's life for ten years. Because of their close relationship, Ai is one of the few people around to which Kaguya's amiability is not an act.

Even if she demonstrates maturity as a valet, Ai still has the concerns of a young girl, such as caring to be in fashion and going out with friends, even if she does not have much time for herself due to work.

Ai helps Kaguya with the struggles about her feelings for [Shirogane](https://anilist.co/character/121101).

~!She later leaves her job as a maid to Kaguya but still continues her friendship.!~

~!In the Doujin-ban universe, she starts dating and later gets engaged to Shirogane!~

characters.name: Kei Shirogane
characters.description:
Kei Shirogane is [Miyuki Shirogane](https://anilist.co/character/121101)'s little sister. She attends Shuchiin middle school and is the treasurer for the middle school student council.

She is a hard worker just like her brother and can be very prideful at times. She also inherited his sense of righteousness and hates it when someone doesn't do the right thing in a given situation. Like her brother, she likes helping out those who are in trouble even if it means going out of her way to do it. Since she grew up in a family that places emphasis on saving money, she normally carries coupons and works hard for the things she wants to buy. 

She developed a prickly attitude towards her brother due to his over protectiveness. She's also entered a rebellious phase and due to her pride and she cannot get herself to have a lighthearted conversation with Miyuki, leading into the similar mind games that Miyuki and [Kaguya](https://anilist.co/character/120649) play against each other, but her objective is to talk to Miyuki without making it look like she has a brother complex. She rarely speaks and most of the time it is only when she exchanges formalities at school or when she hurls abuses at her brother.

characters.name: Erika Kose
characters.description: She is a member of the mass media club at Shuchi'in Academy.

characters.name: Karen Kino
characters.description: She is a member of the mass media club at Shuchi'in Academy.

characters.name: Tsubame Koyasu
characters.description: Tsubame is a third-year student who is vice-captain of the cheer squad and a rhythmic gymnast. She is very popular. She encourages [Yuu](https://anilist.co/character/121102) in the cheering activities.

characters.name: Tsubasa Tanuma
characters.description: He is a student in Shuchi'in highschool and always asks [Miyuki Shirogane](https://anilist.co/character/121101) for advice about love. [Kashiwagi](https://anilist.co/character/134330)'s boyfriend.

characters.name: Maki Shijo
characters.description: Maki is a classmate and friend of [Nagisa](https://anilist.co/character/134330). She has short hair styled in short pigtails. She is friends with Nagisa and is secretly jealous of Nagisa's relationship with her boyfriend, as she too liked Kashiwagi's Boyfriend, but could not confess before. As a branch member of the Shinomiya clan, she is [Kaguya](https://anilist.co/character/120649)'s second cousin twice removed so she sometimes refers to Kaguya as "Auntie". [Miyuki](https://anilist.co/character/121101) and [Yuu](https://anilist.co/character/121102/Yuu-Ishigami) observe she acts very tsundere (cold on the outside but wanting to be affectionate), and similar to Kaguya in personality. She declares Yuu and Miyuki as her friends, due to their support in helping her process her failed romance, much to Kaguya's horror

characters.name: Moeha Fujiwara
characters.description: Moeha is [Chika](https://anilist.co/character/121103)'s little sister who is in junior high. She is the student council vice-president at the junior high. She admires [Miyuki](https://anilist.co/character/121101) as well and hopes to confess someday. She has a habit of voicing dark ideas, which unnerve [Kaguya](https://anilist.co/character/120649) a great deal.

characters.name: Nagisa Kashiwagi
characters.description: Nagisa is a classmate who occasionally asks [Kaguya](https://anilist.co/character/120649) about what to do in her relationships. [Tsubasa](https://anilist.co/character/134327)'s girlfriend.

characters.name: Kobachi Osaragi
characters.description:
Kobachi is [Miko](https://anilist.co/character/125886)'s classmate with the glasses and a member of the disciplinary committee. She has been looking after Miko for over 10 years.

~!Though she doesn't love him in a romantic way, she has liked Yu Ishigami since middle school. She believes that Tsubame Koyasu is a kind person and is therefore supportive of Ishigami's feelings for Tsubame, despite her friend Miko being in love with Ishigami as well.!~

characters.name: Betsy Beltoise
alt_names: べルトクーズ・べツィー
characters.description: The vice president of Shuchi'in Academy's sister school in France.

characters.name: Adolphe Pescarolo
alt_names: アドルフ・ペスカローロ
characters.description:
The Principal of Shuchi'in Academy
He's strict regarding school regulations, but knows how to garner the favor of students nonetheless. He helped Yu Ishigami get enrolled to Shuchi'in despite not finishing his task of making an apology letter. Despite being an authority figure within the school, he has shown comical disregard for school rules and discipline when it comes to his own actions, having been openly caught playing Pokemon Go on more than one occasion on school grounds while chastising nearby students for doing the same.

characters.name: Shirogane no Chichi
characters.description:
Father of [Miyuki](https://anilist.co/character/121101) and [Kei Shirogane](https://anilist.co/character/126144).

~!His wife left him and their factory shut down leaving him to not have any stable employment.!~

~!He later becomes a youtuber.!~

characters.name: Saburo Odajima
characters.description: One of the Four Ramen Emperors of Tokyo. In the past, Saburo was in a relationship with [The Glutton Girl of Jinbocho](https://anilist.co/character/276380/Jinbouchou-no-Glutton-Girl), but he broke up with her over their polar opposite ramen styles, believing they'll eventually end up at each other's throats.

characters.name: Rei Onodera
characters.description: She is a supporting character in the series. She was a member of Shuchi'in's Red Cheer Team and is a classmate of Yu Ishigami and Miko Iino. She is a fairly calm girl under normal circumstances and is fairly open-minded, but when involved with the Cheer Team or the culture festival committee, she becomes far more energetic.

characters.name: Toyomi Fujiwara
characters.description: Toyomi Fujiwara is Chika Fujiwara and Moeha Fujiwara's eldest sister. Toyomi is a girl that likes to wear revealing outfits, her hair is similar to Chika's except that she tied hers with a flower shaped clip to go down on her left shoulder. She usually wears an aloof expression on her face. Toyomi is the laid back older sister type, who is very seductive and does whatever she likes, even against her own parents wishes.

characters.name: Kyoko Ootomo
characters.description: She was [Ishigami](https://anilist.co/character/121102/)'s classmate in their last middle school year. She dated Kou Ogino, who cheated on her without her knowledge.

characters.name: Kou Ogino
characters.description: Former president of Shuchiin Junior High's theater club. Kyoko Ootomo's ex-boyfriend.

characters.name: Kazeno
characters.description:
Kazeno is a third year high school student at Shuchi'in Academy and was the captain of the Cheer Club during the Sports Festival.
He is a very energetic and caring person,cheering on his team and giving support to Yu Ishigami.

characters.name: Kozue Makihara
characters.description: Makkii-senhai is a first-year high school student at Shuchi'in Academy and the president of the Tabletop Gaming Club, As the president of the Tabletop Gaming Club, Kozue loves games. She also has a somewhat sadistic sense of humor, as shown by her cheerfully torturing Miko while gathering audio for their class' event during the culture festival. She is shown to be very intelligent, regularly ranking among the top ten students in the freshman class during the end of semester exams.

characters.name: Terashima
characters.description: She's a third-year high school student at Shuchi'in Academy and a member of the Tabletop Gaming Club which Chika Fujiwara is also a part of. Terashima, being demoted from Terako to Gigako, is a pun on metric prefixes

characters.name: Daichi Fujiwara
characters.description:
A politician and the father of Toyomi, Chika and Moeha Fujiwara.
Daichi is very well mannered and professional. He’s also overly protective of his daughters.

characters.name: Shouzou Tanuma
characters.description:
Shouzou Tanuma is a world famous heart surgeon and the physician of the Shinomiya family.
He is also Tsubasa's grandfather

characters.name: Mikado Shijo
alt_names: Boyfucker Mikado (ボーイファッカー帝)
characters.description:
Mikado is the twin brother of [Maki](https://anilist.co/edit/character/134328). He is among the story's smartest characters, as he placed first in the national mock exam during freshman year, to [Miyuki](https://anilist.co/character/121101)'s second place. As such, Miyuki has had an obsession with beating him in a rematch. However, Mikado chose to attend a nearby public school in order to play soccer with his friends.

~!After leading his team to the national championship, Mikado transfers to Shuchiin, where he becomes a member of Class 3-A, along with all of the story's notable third years, including Kaguya, Miyuki, Maki, [Chika](https://anilist.co/character/121103/) and [Ai](https://anilist.co/character/121104/).!~

~!Mikado is revealed to be very much a normal teenager, albeit a genius, as he has normal worries like being able to make friends at a new school. He also readily defers to his sister, despite finding her crazy and incomprehensible. Interestingly, Mikado is very similar to Miyuki, and the two quickly go from misunderstood rivals to close friends.!~

characters.name: Zen Seito Kaichou
characters.description:
The Previous Student Council President (real name unknown) is a supporting character in the series. He is a third-year high school student at Shuchi'in Academy and the president of the 66th Student Council.

He is a third year student at Shuchi'in Academy and was the president of the School Council when Miyuki Shirogane was in his first year.

characters.name: Momo Ryuuju
characters.description:
Momo Ryuuju is a supporting character in the series. She is the president of the Astronomy Club and one of The Impossible Girls.
As a member of a yakuza family, she places little value on the school rules, as seen by her wearing a hat and playing games on her cellphone while on school grounds. She also has a short temper, and others view her as being threatening.

characters.name: Koromo Shiranui
characters.description:
Koromo Shiranui is a supporting character in the series. She is a first year student at Shuchi'in Academy and one of The Impossible Girls.

 ~!She is the older sister of [Frill Shiranui](https://anilist.co/character/223871) from [[Oshi no Ko]](https://anilist.co/manga/117195/Oshi-no-Ko/).!~

characters.name: Hikaru Oobayashi
characters.description: He is classroom 3-A homeroom teacher. He was transferred in Shuchiin Academy from a public high school.

characters.name: Gou Kazamatsuri
characters.description: Like Shirogane, he attended an outside middle school before entering Shuchiin. He enrolled in order to look for clues regarding the disappearance of his older brother. He serves as an assistant to the "Investigator of the financial world" Hajime Echizen and, after solving many difficult cases has finally been reunited with his brother.

characters.name: Nao Hayasaka
characters.description:
Nao Hayasaka is Ai's mother. The two of them are shown to have a close relationship, though Ai is often upset by her mother's job keeping them from spending much time together. She also works for the Shinomiya family.

Daughter: [__Ai Hayasaka__](https://anilist.co/character/121104/)
Spouse: __Masato Hayasaka__

characters.name: J Suzuki
characters.description: A taxi driver and one of the Four Ramen Emperors of Tokyo.

characters.name: Miki
characters.description: An elementary school student

characters.name: Saburou Toyosaki
characters.description: In the past, he used underhanded tactics to sabotage [Shirogane](https://anilist.co/character/121101/)'s grades, but he now fights fair and square. He only opens his eyes when he shows his "true power."

characters.name: Subaru Suruga
characters.description: One of [Ai Hayasaka](https://anilist.co/character/121104/)'s closest friends. She wears her Shuchi'in Academy school uniform modified to match up with kogal fashion. She is the daughter of the president of an IT company.

characters.name: Mirin Hinokuchi
characters.description: One of [Ai Hayasaka](https://anilist.co/character/121104/)'s closest friends. She wears her Shuchi'in Academy school uniform modified to match up with kogal fashion. She is the daughter of an advertising executive.

characters.name: Singh
characters.description: Singh was the guide during the Shijo twins' trip to India.

characters.name: Yume Atenbo
characters.description: President of the Occult Research Club. Her grandfather is a high ranking Shinto priest. She loves to tease couples, so most of her predictions are excuses for sexual harassment.

characters.name: Jinbouchou no Glutton Girl
alt_names: 神保町のグラットンガール
characters.description: One of the Four Ramen Emperors of Tokyo. She dated [Saburo Odajima](https://anilist.co/character/137169/Saburo-Odajima) in the past, but he broke up with her over their conflicting ramen styles. She felt unable to change her way of life and continued to pursue her style. In the present she had forgotten why she began eating ramen like this, until she happens to see [Chika Fujiwara](https://anilist.co/character/121103/Chika-Fujiwara)'s satisfaction from finishing a bowl of ramen.

characters.name: Takahiko Tanuma
characters.description: One of the Four Ramen Emperors of Tokyo.

characters.name: Seiryuu Shinomiya
characters.description: [Kaguya Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/120649/Kaguya-Shinomiya)'s second half-brother.

characters.name: Oko Shinomiya
characters.description: Eldest half-brother of [Kaguya Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/manga/86635/Kaguyasama-Love-is-War/characters). He is the heir apparent to the Shinomiya Zaibatsu.

characters.name: Ganan Shinomiya
characters.description: Head of the Shinomiya Zaibatsu. He is the father of [Kaguya Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/120649/Kaguya-Shinomiya) and her three half-brothers Oko, Seriyuu, and Un'yo. He is a very cold and neglectful father, who is always away from his family on business trips to extend his own power. He ordered Kaguya to be raised in an overly protective and shielded environment.

characters.name: Unyo Shinomiya
characters.description: [Kaguya Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/120649/Kaguya-Shinomiya)'s third half-brother. According to [Chika Fujiwara](https://anilist.co/character/121103/Chika-Fujiwara), he is the only brother who actually loves Kaguya as family. While growing, young Kaguya was guided into high society by him. Unyo takes the Shinomiya family's discipline to heart. He is cold, conniving and cunning.

characters.name: Masaru Kobayashi
characters.description: Treasurer of the culture festival committee. He has a crush on [Tsubame Koyasu](https://anilist.co/character/134326/Tsubame-Koyasu).

characters.name: Teppei Tanaka
characters.description: A member of Shuchi'in Academy's Public Relations team. He has a crush on [Tsubame Koyasu](https://anilist.co/character/134326/Tsubame-Koyasu).

characters.name: Daiki Satou
characters.description: Safety Officer of the Shuchi'in Academy culture festival committee. He has a crush on [Tsubame Koyasu](https://anilist.co/character/134326/Tsubame-Koyasu)

characters.name: Maho Fujiwara
characters.description: Maho Fujiwara is a supporting character in the series. She is the wife of Daichi Fujiwara and the mother of Toyomi Fujiwara, Chika Fujiwara and Moeha Fujiwara.

characters.name: Ruby Hoshino
characters.description:
__Height:__ 158 cm (5'2")

[Ai Hoshino](https://anilist.co/character/172759/Ai-Hoshino)'s daughter, and the younger twin sister of [Aquamarine Hoshino](https://anilist.co/character/183885). 
~!She was previously a patient named Sarina under Goro's care. Due to her illness, she was wheelchair-bound. After discovering B-Komachi, she had always aspired to be an idol although her condition kept her from achieving her dream. Since being reincarnated as Ruby, she is now working towards her dream of being an idol like Ai. To do so she's currently working with Strawberry Productions to revive B-Komachi along with Arima Kana and Memcho.!~

characters.name: Kana Arima
characters.description:
__Height:__ 150 cm (4'11")

An actress who was called a prodigy child. She has a rather stubborn personality yet an empathic side to her. She easily succumbs to pressure and while she does put up a front to others, she has very self-deprecating thoughts when it comes to her abilities. She's an honest and earnest person, who is very diligent and persistent even in the roughest of times. Also, she tends to place all responsibility on herself when it comes to others as she is the one who has the most experience in the show business world. She also hates bell peppers.
  
~!After the events of the Sweet Today Drama adaptation, she secretly develops a crush for Aquamarine.!~

~!She longs for someone to look at her for who she is now and praise her efforts, someone to say that its okay for her to be here. And after the new B-Komachi's first concert, that person becomes Aquamarine after he waves her respected colored glow stick. Only reinforcing Kana's resolve to make Aquamarine fall for her.!~

characters.name: MEM-cho
characters.description:
__Height:__ 155 cm (5'1")

A girl who strived to become an idol at a young age, but due to her family situation, made sacrifices that ultimately ended with her becoming too old to become one. She is a YouTuber. 

~!Mem-cho's real age is 25, and she is later recruited as the third member of the re-formed B-Komachi idol group.!~

characters.name: Ienaga
characters.description: An elementary school student

characters.name: Pes
characters.description: Pes is the beloved pet dog of [Chika Fujiwara](https://anilist.co/character/121103/Chika-Fujiwara). He is quite a large dog, with golden fur and floppy ears. He has piercing eyes like [the president](https://anilist.co/character/121101/Miyuki-Shirogane)

characters.name: Maki
characters.description: Hoped to hangout with Takkun, but he prioritized soccer instead. She does wanna cheer for him.

characters.name: Tenchou
characters.description: A ramen chef

characters.name: Shitsuji
characters.description: One of the butler's assigned to [Kaguya](https://anilist.co/character/120649/Kaguya-Shinomiya)

characters.name: Fujiwara Sofu
characters.description: The grandfather of the Fujiwara sisters.

characters.name: Ishigami no Ani
characters.description: Older brother of [Yuu Ishigami](https://anilist.co/character/121102/Yuu-Ishigami). He is next in line to inherit their dad's toy company.

characters.name: Gomanosuke
characters.description: The pet cat of Abe. He has sleek black fur and piercing eyes. Despite his appearance Gomanosuke is a very friendly individual, rubbing himself on [Kaguya](https://anilist.co/character/120649/Kaguya-Shinomiya)'s legs, and being popular in the school.

characters.name: Kojima
characters.description: A first year student of Shuchi'in Academy High School and the current captain of the Kendo Club. He has been shown to come into conflict with Momo Ryuju as a result of their parents occupying high positions within the police department and Yakuza respectively.

characters.name: Komari Machida
characters.description: Homeroom teacher of Class 2-A

characters.name: Nayotake Shimizu
characters.description:
~![Kaguya Shinomiya](https://anilist.co/character/120649/)'s mother. She died 30th of January, 29 days after giving birth to Kaguya.!~

~!In Chapter 242, it was revealed that she worked in Gion's red light district as a prostitute.!~
